text_block_list.text:
Summer training camp. Daiwa Scarlet wasted no time and went 
straight into training by the beach…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Pant… pant… pant… phew… I'm sweating so hard from the heat…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I'm taking a short break… sigh… Training on sand is really tiring…
choice_data_list: Tiring, but efficient.
Tiring, but efficient.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'd be mad if it wasn't. 
I wouldn't agree to doing it if all it did was drain my energy.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Well, I don't mind the challenge. If I can get through this, I'll 
be even more worthy of being number one.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Now then, break time's over. Let's resume my training.

She might have regained a bit of her breath after taking a break, 
but I could tell that she was starting to get a bit dizzy from 
the heat and the exhaustion in her legs.
choice_data_list: Let's call it a day for now.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huh? Were you even listening to what I was saying?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I said I don't mind the challenge! What's the point of doing 
a training camp if we don't train harder than we usually do?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
If I'm already throwing in the towel over something like this, 
there's no way I'll be number one!
choice_data_list: Overdoing it's no good either.
Overdoing it's no good either.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: You don't have to tell me. I know that much… kya!?
One step, and Daiwa Scarlet had lost her balance.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Tch… I can't be number one if I get exhausted 
from something like this. I've got to keep-
choice_data_list: Rest is also part of your training.
Rest is also part of your training.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …sigh. Fine. In that case, I'll take another break and then I'll…
choice_data_list: There's always tomorrow, you know?
There's always tomorrow, you know?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Alright then, I'll follow you this time.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: You are my trainer, after all. It'd be annoying with you giving me that worried look the entire time.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Ah well. Once I get back to regular condition, 
I swear I'll make up for lost time.
choice_data_list: Don't go running in secret, okay?
Don't go running in secret, okay?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Trainer. Just so you know, I'm not a kid anymore 
so could you stop patronizing me?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Training's over, so I'm free to do whatever I want, right? 
Well then, see you later.

Daiwa Scarlet went back to the dorm, 
still unsteady from training.

That night, as I was walking on the hallway on my way to check up 
on Daiwa Scarlet, I got approached by an unfamiliar horse girl…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Scarlet's trainer. 
Were you looking for her?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
I don't think she's in her room anymore. 
I saw her heading towards the front door just a while ago.

She should still be exhausted from training just this afternoon 
and yet she's walking out by herself… I wonder if she's okay.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's you, Trainer. What's wrong? You don't look too good.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I was just about to go for a walk-
choice_data_list: I'll go with you!
I'll go with you!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I-I don't mind, but… what are you getting so worked up over?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Don't tell me. 
You still think I'm going to go train in secret?
choice_data_list: I got worried because you were stumbling.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that. I'm fine. Really. 
I got to relax in the bath and even took a nap.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I won't do anything to tire myself out.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
That said, you sure are a worrywart. I kept thinking to myself, 
"Does he even trust me?" at first, but…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
…That does it. 
I'll make sure to show you that I'm doing fine now!

As I followed her around, we heard the 
sound of a festival happening nearby-

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I heard they were doing a festival around here and 
I was just about to go before I saw you. Hey, is the 
festival smell making you feel hungry too?
choice_data_list: Looks like your appetite is fine, too.
Looks like your appetite is fine, too.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Of course it is! I'm fine because I've been eating properly, right?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Well then, we better stock up on the festival food! 
Ah, but before that… let's play and have as much fun as we can!

After we had our fun in the festival, we stocked up on food and 
went back to the beach. Yakisoba, takoyaki, shaved ice, cotton 
candy… gone one after another…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Ahh, that was so good! No complaints here.
choice_data_list: I'm glad you're doing fine.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I told you so. 
Don't worry about me so much.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Well, to be fair, I did do some pretty dumb things by myself back 
then, but… Now I'm not alone anymore.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, there you have it, so, I'm fine now! 
Got it!?
choice_data_list: I'm glad you're relying on me more.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: H-hey, I didn't say I was talking about you, though!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: It's just… you are a professional trainer, after all… I just thought it makes sense for me to trust you when it comes to training.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm just saying, you need to take responsibility 
for what you said before! You're the one who said "let's 
aim for number one together," you know!?
choice_data_list: I will! Leave it to me!
I will! Leave it to me!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …Look at you, you're so happy.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to put way more effort into training tomorrow than I 
did today, so you better get ready too.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: It takes two to be number one.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
So… you should become the "number 
one" trainer and follow after me!

The following day. Running with more power than before, Daiwa 
Scarlet shined brightly under the radiant sun.
